cbinstall.name: CB Activity
cbinstall.author: Krileon
cbinstall.copyright: (C) 2004-2015 www.joomlapolis.com / Lightning MultiCom SA - and its licensors, all rights reserved
cbinstall.description: Displays various user activity on profile.

param.name: field_activity_direction
param.label: Direction
param.description: Select the direction the stream displays.

param.name: field_activity_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select status post create access. Access determines who can post status activity. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

param.name: field_activity_message_limit
param.label: Message Limit
param.description: Input number of characters a status message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: field_activity_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_actions
param.label: Actions
param.description: Enable or disable usage of activity status actions.

param.name: field_activity_actions_message_limit
param.label: Message Limit
param.description: Input number of characters a status action message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_locations
param.label: Locations
param.description: Enable or disable usage of activity status locations.

param.name: field_activity_locations_address_limit
param.label: Address Limit
param.description: Input number of characters a status location address can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_links
param.label: Links
param.description: Enable or disable usage of activity status links.

param.name: field_activity_links_link_limit
param.label: Link Limit
param.description: Input number of links a status message can have. If 0 allow unlimited links. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_tags
param.label: Tags
param.description: Enable or disable usage of activity status tags.

param.name: field_activity_comments
param.label: Comments
param.description: Enable or disable usage of activity comments.

param.name: field_activity_comments_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select comment post create access. Access determines who can post a comment. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

param.name: field_activity_comments_message_limit
param.label: Message Limit
param.description: Input number of characters a comment message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_comments_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: field_activity_comments_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_comments_replies
param.label: Replies
param.description: Enable or disable usage of activity comments replies.

param.name: field_activity_comments_replies_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select comment post create access. Access determines who can post a comment. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

param.name: field_activity_comments_replies_message_limit
param.label: Message Limit
param.description: Input number of characters a comment message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_activity_comments_replies_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: field_activity_comments_replies_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_comments_direction
param.label: Direction
param.description: Select the direction the stream displays.

param.name: field_comments_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select comment post create access. Access determines who can post a comment. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

param.name: field_comments_message_limit
param.label: Message Limit
param.description: Input number of characters a comment message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_comments_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: field_comments_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: field_comments_replies
param.label: Replies
param.description: Enable or disable usage of comments replies.

param.name: field_comments_replies_create_access

param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: general_template
param.label: Template
param.description: Select template to be used for all of CB Activity. If template is incomplete then missing files will be used from the default template. Template files can be located at the following location: components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbactivity/templates/.

param.name: general_class
param.label: Class
param.description: Optionally add a class suffix to surrounding DIV encasing all of CB Activity.

param.name: general_delete
param.label: Auto Delete
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of activity when a user is deleted.

param.label: Create Access

param.name: cleanup_url
param.label: URL
param.description: Your site unique URL that can be used in CRON or directly accessed to cleanup old activity from the database.

param.name: cleanup_duration
param.label: Duration
param.description: Select how long to keep activity.
